comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: The Rolls-Royce Merlin powered C-4 Argonauts built for BOAC had the dimensions of the DC-4 but some of the features of the DC-6 (e.g pressurization). The similar C-4 North Stars built for Trans Canada Airlines were also pressurized. The North Stars used by the RCAF were unpressurized and some used Douglas Chicago built C-54 fuselages bought as war factory surplus
